name: Witch Helpers
description:
You're testing out a new app that lets you summon witches whenever you need them. What could possibly go wrong?

Made by Atiya Nova. 

**I realize it's not entirely clear--you unlock the phone by swiping across the letters at the bottom. Just click and drag the mouse.

**** This project is a little incomplete. I'll be releasing a post jam update that has the following ***

-Multiple endings depending on your choices

-Improved story based off of feedback

-New and polished art

-Character reactions

-Animations

-Proper sound design

I'll get this done asap! :)
